scripts.secure: rm -rf build/https && mkdir build/https && openssl genrsa -out build/https/fastify.key 2048 && openssl req -new -x509 -key build/https/fastify.key -out build/https/fastify.crt -days 3650 -subj /CN=localhost
scripts.build: rm -rf build && yarn run build:server && yarn run build:client
scripts.build:client: cd client && yarn run build && cd - && mv client/build build/public
scripts.build:server: cd server && yarn run build && cd - && cp -rf ./server/build ./build
scripts.test: CI=true cd server && yarn test && cd - && cd client && yarn test && cd -
